messages: 5cf549e16014b23f95226f574d6073ea (02:20): Hi peeps.  How do I make a floating div stretch to 100% length of the content of a page?   I have a bar on the left hand side, but setting height to 100% just makes it 100% of the window - scrolling down shows the end of it before the content
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (02:30): Is there any way to remove whitespace from markup? I have two images that butt up to each other, but I want to put a linebreak between them in the source ..
b94923bd08c1e791653e442d3aae4086 (02:31): Woosta, did you come up with something for that, yet?
3c26b6648764f1ab4360aa71da5d760b (02:31): Don't just stand there smiling at me .. answer the damned question :)
ab7683bd426e4d1f23dfc19ec446c9c3 (02:31): my <p></p>s is doing some spacing, before and after itself. how can i disable that with css?
b94923bd08c1e791653e442d3aae4086 (02:32): so you want the to be adjacent, but just not the tags, in the src?

e6b617a2b96652e79c15e1be715109e8 (02:32): Woosta:  Start every stylesheet with this: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; }. You'll save yourself the confusion over quite a few strange element and browser spacing differences later on.

c95720c193df40ce1618d1b00b040b42 (02:32): zip: Start every stylesheet with this: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; }. You'll save yourself the confusion over quite a few strange element and browser spacing differences later on.

e6b617a2b96652e79c15e1be715109e8 (02:33): reisio:  Start every stylesheet with this: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; }. You'll save yourself the confusion over quite a few strange element and browser spacing differences later on.

f9c3c3719f744f6b5fc6c04567ccdb92 (03:10): reisio, what should I use instead? line height?
f9c3c3719f744f6b5fc6c04567ccdb92 (03:11): reisio, a message displays inside that paragraph, depending on a form validation, through php
f9c3c3719f744f6b5fc6c04567ccdb92 (03:12): reisio, to keep the full width of an empty line
f9c3c3719f744f6b5fc6c04567ccdb92 (03:12): in case the message is not displayed
f9c3c3719f744f6b5fc6c04567ccdb92 (03:13): because there's one p on top of the other
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (03:13): should retain its height even if it's empty, I think
